<h3 id="X34824">X(34824)&nbsp;=&nbsp; CENTER OF PERSPECONIC OF THESE TRIANGLES: CEVIAN OF X(2) AND ANTICEVIAN OF X(45)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a*b - b^2 + 2*a*c + 4*b*c - c^2 : :
